intent_atoms.description: Evaluate rotor categories for validation issues once new UX research defines expected groupings.
Capture phonetic spellings or abbreviations for frequently announced hex byte patterns if VoiceOver pronunciation causes confusion during manual QA.

functional_units.name: Rotor Category Evaluation
functional_units.description: Evaluates rotor categories for validation issues based on new UX research groupings.

functional_units.name: Phonetic Spelling Capture for Hex Patterns
functional_units.description: Captures phonetic spellings or abbreviations for frequently announced hex byte patterns to improve VoiceOver pronunciation during manual QA.
